title: Accordion
description: A red accordion with a keyboard on one side, buttons on the other side, and bellows in the middle. Used to talk about accordion music or music in general. Also may be used in reference to things that expand and contract, or are folded like the bellows of an accordion.
apple_vendor_description: The accordion emoji on Apple devices is a beautifully rendered musical instrument, showcasing Apple's dedication to intricate detail and polished 3D design. Its bellows are depicted with a subtle, inviting texture and soft, rounded folds, while the keys and straps gleam with realistic highlights. On Apple devices, this emoji radiates a warm, nostalgic charm, perfect for expressing a love of music, folk traditions, or a cheerful, lively mood.
